segments.text: Hello , Miao Li , Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I am going to the store to buy some fruit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , Would you do me a favor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please mail this letter for me on your way to the store .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Do you want it to be registered ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think so . There are some pictures in it . It would be a great pity if they were lost .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I will be glad to mail your letter .
segments.speaker: S2
